rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light and a welcoming aesthetic.
Expansive living area designed in industrial style with exposed brick finishes and metal accents. Incorporates Vastu recommendations for prosperity.
Modern dining space adjoining the living room, featuring an open-plan layout with a kitchen island as per local building norms.
Dedicated entertainment zone with acoustic treatments and industrial design elements. Equipped with floor-to-ceiling windows for ambient lighting when not in use.
Functional kitchen designed with local building standards, integrating energy-efficient appliances and ample storage space.
Compact bathroom ensuring compliance with plumbing norms and featuring a minimalist design for ease of maintenance.

openings.description: Large door facilitating a smooth transition from indoor to the expansive garden area.

additional_features.description: A large, landscaped garden that adheres to local norms and Vastu principles, promoting a harmonious living environment.
The villa features industrial design elements such as exposed brickwork, metal fixtures, and utilitarian aesthetics integrated with modern comforts.
